sentences.en: 'soap, towels, and a pitcher of ice - water. "
sentences.cn: “给我们 拿 肥皂 、 毛巾和一壶冰水来. ”

sentences.en: A pitcher of ice water sweats on a hot day.
sentences.cn: 盛着冰水的水罐表面在热天会结水珠.

sentences.en: Any pitcher is liable to crack during a tight game.
sentences.cn: 任何投手在紧张的比赛中都可能会失常.

sentences.en: As a pitcher, Luther is better than James by a long chalk.
sentences.cn: 作为一名棒球投手, 卢瑟比詹姆斯高明得多.

sentences.en: He is the best pitcher I've ever seen.
sentences.cn: 他是我见到的最好的投球手.

sentences.en: He poured the milk from the Pitcher.
He poured the milk out of the pitcher.
The blue pitcher has yellow bands around the neck.
sentences.cn: 那把蓝色水壶的柄上有一圈圈黄色条纹.

sentences.en: The pitcher goes often to the well but is broken at last.
The pitcher has beaned as many as three batters in this game.
sentences.cn: 在这?热?投手投球竟打中了三个击手的头.

sentences.en: To them, she was Molly Pitcher.
sentences.cn: 对他们而言, 她就是“送水莫莉”.

words.tran_cn: 沥青；音高；程度；树脂；倾斜；投掷
使倾斜；扎营；投掷（pitch的过去分词）
使倾斜（pitch的ing形式）；投掷；用沥青涂；为…定调
投；掷；定位于；用沥青涂；扎营；向前倾跌

trans.tran_en: the player in baseball who throws the ball
